title: Henry Bellini, tightrope walker, prepares to cross the Falls
subject: Niagara Falls; man; wire
description: A photograph by George E. Curtis with no caption. This photograph is of Henry Bellini who came in August of 1873 to cross Niagara Falls on a tightrope. He appears to be preparing to cross.
